Get PPRRVU File by Year

Source: R/get_rvu_files.R
get_pprrvu.Rd

Get PPRRVU File by Year

Usage

get_pprrvu(year)

Arguments

year

<int> year of rvu source file; default is 2023

Value

<tibble> containing pprrvu source file

Examples

get_pprrvu(2024)
#> # A tibble: 74,196 × 34
#>    source_file date_start date_end   hcpcs mod   description         status_code
#>    <chr>       <date>     <date>     <chr> <chr> <chr>               <chr>      
#>  1 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0021 NA    Outside state ambu… I          
#>  2 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0080 NA    Noninterest escort… I          
#>  3 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0090 NA    Interest escort in… I          
#>  4 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0100 NA    Nonemergency trans… I          
#>  5 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0110 NA    Nonemergency trans… I          
#>  6 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0120 NA    Noner transport mi… I          
#>  7 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0130 NA    Noner transport wh… I          
#>  8 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0140 NA    Nonemergency trans… I          
#>  9 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0160 NA    Noner transport ca… I          
#> 10 rvu24a_jan  2024-01-01 2024-03-31 A0170 NA    Transport parking … I          
#> # ℹ 74,186 more rows
#> # ℹ 27 more variables: not_used_for_medicare_payment <chr>, work_rvu <dbl>,
#> #   non_fac_pe_rvu <dbl>, non_fac_indicator <chr>, facility_pe_rvu <dbl>,
#> #   facility_indicator <chr>, mp_rvu <dbl>, non_facility_total <dbl>,
#> #   facility_total <dbl>, pctc_ind <chr>, glob_days <chr>, pre_op <dbl>,
#> #   intra_op <dbl>, post_op <dbl>, mult_proc <chr>, bilat_surg <chr>,
#> #   asst_surg <chr>, co_surg <chr>, team_surg <chr>, endo_base <chr>, …
